sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular octagon has sides of 5 cm each. Find the perimeter of the octagon.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a regular octagon, you simply multiply the length of one side by the total number of sides. In this case, the length of one side is 5 cm and there are 8 sides in an octagon.

Perimeter = (side length) × (number of sides)
Perimeter = 5 cm × 8
Perimeter = 40 cm

The perimeter of the regular octagon is 40 cm.
